1.title: New Languages in Our Agency
1.content: We are pleased to announce the expansion of our language list. Now we offer translations in Chinese and Japanese.

2.title: Certificate Updates
2.content: Our translators have successfully completed recertification and received new international certificates.

3.title: New Services
3.content: We are launching a new service - simultaneous translation for online conferences and webinars.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Medius Translation Agency is a team of professional translators with years of experience. We guarantee high-quality translations and meeting all deadlines.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for inquiries or to request our services.

technical.title: Technical Translation
technical.description: Translation of technical documentation, manuals, drawings

medical.title: Medical Translation
medical.description: Translation of medical documents, research, reports

legal.title: Legal Translation
legal.description: Translation of contracts, agreements, legal documents

literary.title: Literary Translation
literary.description: Translation of literary texts, books, articles

notary.title: Notary Translation
notary.description: Translation of documents with notary certification

interpretation.title: Interpretation
interpretation.description: Simultaneous and consecutive interpretation at events
